name: Classic Columns
description:
Columns, puzzle game, is one of the most exciting and popular games.
Switch the falling colored columns so that they fall into a row of three or more similar colors, either horizontally, diagonally or vertically! Rack up the points as quick as you can, because this puzzle game won't sympathize with you!

* FEATURES
- Advanced scoring
- Two various themes
- Game Center support
- Local High Score (w/o inet connection)
- Easy control - just one finger
